name: AdMix Social
tagline: Scottsdale Online & Social Media Marketing Agency
description:
AdMix Social is a Social Media and Online Marketing solutions company that offers over 35 years of combined strategic experience in advertising, marketing and sales. We understand that there is whole lot more to social media marketing than creating a Facebook Page or a Twitter profile and calling it a day. We develop custom strategies that will take your company to the next level.
We view each client as a partner at AdMix Social. We provide exemplary service to achieve the goals of our clients.
